title: Bug 7752: Exporting multiple files with same name under different directories to zip file fails
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up stating that problems were encountered during export. The error message specifically lists the file with the same name in project 2 as the problem.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects. 
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (e.g., 'foo.txt'). 
3. From the main menu, select 'File' > 'Export' and choose 'Zip File' as the export option. 
4. Follow the steps to export the files to a zip file.
